item.description: tsunamid帮助 Settings in the Tsunami Client $ tsunami Tsunami Client for protocol rev 20061025 Revision: v1.1 devel cvsbuild 31 Compiled: Dec 15 2006 14:57:59 tsunami> set server = localhost -- to which currently connected port = 46224 -- TCP control port on server udpport = 46224 -- UDP receiving port on client to use buffer = 20000000 -- size of the
